block_comment: This block of code is used for synchronous reset and update of the 'WillSendControlFrame_sync1' register. On the positive-edge transition of either 'wb_clk_i' or 'wb_rst_i', the block gets triggered. If the 'wb_rst_i' signal is active, it resets the 'willSendControlFrame_sync1' register to zero. Otherwise, after a propagation delay specified by 'Tp', it updates 'willSendControlFrame_sync1' with the value of 'WillSendControlFrame'.
